name: Catventure (itch) (Axolot)
description:
Bio:

Collect the gems!!

Getting loot while looking cute. This game is about chilling with your cat mates and making fat stacks.

Controls:

Move: arrow keys

Drop last item in chain: Z

Use last item in chain: X

Toggle pause: P

Return to title screen: Escape

Delete save file: D

Toggle audio mute: M


Credits:

Programming: Samuel Allen, Milan Marocchi

Music: Louis Schelfhout
